verses.text: Aleph. \w How|strong="H0349"\w* hath \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w covered|strong="H1323"\w* \w with|strong="H3117"\w* obscurity \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sion \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*! \w how|strong="H0349"\w* hath \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* \w down|strong="H7993"\w* \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* footstool \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H2142"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*!

Beth. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* hath \w cast|strong="H5060"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w* headlong, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* beautiful \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H2040"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* strong holds \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* virgin \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w brought|strong="H1104"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w down|strong="H2040"\w* \w to|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: \w he|strong="H3808"\w* hath \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* unclean, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* thereof.

Ghimel. \w He|strong="H6440"\w* hath broken \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w fierce|strong="H2750"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w he|strong="H6440"\w* hath \w drawn|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H6440"\w* hath kindled \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w* \w as|strong="H0398"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3290"\w* \w flaming|strong="H3852"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w round|strong="H5439"\w* \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

Daleth. \w He|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* \w as|strong="H0168"\w* an \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w fixed|strong="H5324"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w as|strong="H0168"\w* an adversary: \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* fair \w to|strong="H5869"\w* behold \w in|strong="H0784"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Sion, \w he|strong="H3605"\w* hath \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* indignation \w like|strong="H1323"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3478"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: \w he|strong="H3478"\w* hath cast down \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* headlong, \w he|strong="H3478"\w* hath overthrown \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* walls thereof: \w he|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* strong holds, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* hath \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Juda \w the|strong="H3605"\w* afflicted, \w both|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w women|strong="H1323"\w*.

Vau. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w garden|strong="H1588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath thrown \w down|strong="H0639"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H7900"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath caused \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Sion: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath delivered \w up|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* reproach, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w indignation|strong="H2195"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w*.

Zain. \w The|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hath cursed \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*: \w he|strong="H3117"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w towers|strong="H0759"\w* thereof \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H5414"\w* solemn \w feast|strong="H4150"\w*.

Heth. \w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w purposed|strong="H2803"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sion: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* line, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* withdrawn \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroying|strong="H7843"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* bulwark hath \w mourned|strong="H0056"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w* hath \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

Teth. \w Her|strong="H1571"\w* \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* \w are|strong="H5030"\w* \w sunk|strong="H2883"\w* \w into|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*: \w he|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w bars|strong="H1280"\w*: \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w are|strong="H5030"\w* \w among|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Gentiles|strong="H1471"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H0369"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H1571"\w* \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w have|strong="H0369"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w vision|strong="H2377"\w* \w from|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

Jod. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* ancients \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Sion \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* held \w their|strong="H5921"\w* peace: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* sprinkled \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w are|strong="H0776"\w* \w girded|strong="H2296"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* haircloth, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w virgins|strong="H1330"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* hang \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.

Caph. \w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w failed|strong="H3615"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* weeping, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bowels|strong="H4578"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* troubled: \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w liver|strong="H3516"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w poured|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w when|strong="H3615"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w children|strong="H5768"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* sucklings, fainted \w away|strong="H3615"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H7151"\w*.

Lamed. \w They|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H0413"\w* \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w*: \w Where|strong="H0346"\w* \w is|strong="H5315"\w* corn \w and|strong="H3196"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*? \w when|strong="H0559"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* fainted away \w as|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w wounded|strong="H2491"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w streets|strong="H7339"\w* \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*: \w when|strong="H0559"\w* \w they|strong="H0559"\w* breathed \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w their|strong="H0413"\w* \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* bosoms \w of|strong="H5315"\w* \w their|strong="H0413"\w* \w mothers|strong="H0517"\w*.

Mem. \w To|strong="H3389"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w compare|strong="H1819"\w* thee? \w or|strong="H1419"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w liken|strong="H1819"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*? \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w equal|strong="H1819"\w* thee, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H4310"\w* \w comfort|strong="H5162"\w* thee, \w O|strong="H4310"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* Sion? \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* thy \w destruction|strong="H7667"\w*: \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w heal|strong="H7495"\w* thee?

Nun. Thy \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w false|strong="H7723"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* foolish \w things|strong="H1540"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w laid|strong="H1540"\w* \w open|strong="H1540"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, \w to|strong="H7725"\w* excite thee \w to|strong="H7725"\w* penance: \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5030"\w* \w seen|strong="H2372"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* thee \w false|strong="H7723"\w* revelations \w and|strong="H7725"\w* banishments.

Samech. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* clapped \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* hissed, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* wagged \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Is|strong="H0776"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w perfect|strong="H3632"\w* \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w joy|strong="H4885"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*?

Phe. \w All|strong="H3605"\w* thy \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* thee: \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* hissed, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w gnashed|strong="H2786"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w teeth|strong="H8127"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w We|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w up|strong="H7200"\w*: lo, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w which|strong="H2088"\w* \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w*: \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*, \w we|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

Ain. \w The|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w purposed|strong="H2161"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath fulfilled \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w word|strong="H0565"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* old: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w destroyed|strong="H2040"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w spared|strong="H2550"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w caused|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* hath \w set|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w horn|strong="H7161"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* thy adversaries.
